product.name: Revlon Ultra HD Matte Lipcolor
product.description:
Revlon Ultra HD Matte Lipcolor gives you lightweight, high definition velvety matte color. It has a moisturizing, velvety 
feel with a 100% wax-free, gel formula. Features: Creamy mango and whipped vanilla fragrance 
Plush velvety applicator Shade Range: (top row, left to right / bottom row, left to right) Devotion, Obsession, Addiction, Temptation / Flirtation, Love, Seduction, Passion
